description.pt_BR: Apple Inc. é uma empresa multinacional norte-americana que tem o objetivo de projetar e comercializar produtos eletrônicos de consumo, software de computador e computadores pessoais.
description.en: Apple Inc. is an American multinational company that aims to design and market consumer electronics, computer software and personal computers.
description.ga_IE: Is cuideachta ilnáisiúnta Meiriceánach é Apple Inc. a bhfuil sé mar aidhm aige leictreonaic tomhaltóra, bogearraí ríomhaireachta agus ríomhairí pearsanta a dhearadh agus a mhargú.
